attributes.action: stop the National Staff Dismissal Register/database going live
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is to be an online database of staff that have been dismissed for theft/dishonesty/what ever your boss says. This will have no regulation and will effect many peoples working life and careers. All it takes in one vindictive boss to post a report that you stole from them (whether or not there is a police investigation and what ever the outcomes of that investigation) when you in fact did nothing wrong and you will be unemployable.

The BBC Have written an article on this. 
Search "bust up with the boss" in news and sport for more details.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
